## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G18130](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G18130)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RACK1C, RACK1C_AT, RACK1x</u>
- **Gene Name:** receptor for activated C kinase 1C, receptor for activated C kinase 1C, Ribosomal Protein RACK1x
- **Description:**   receptor for activated C kinase 1C;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G18130.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G18130.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS68990]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;No visible phenotype.
   - [CS68991]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;No visible phenotype.
   - [CS68993]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Enhanced rack1a-1 phenotype resulting in the following: reduced number of rosette leaves, smaller rosette size, shorter primary root growth and fewer lateral roots compared to both wildtype and rack1a-1 single mutants.
   - [CS68994]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;No visible phenotype.
